price: ហើយក៏មិនមែនជាពាក្យពេចន៍របស់គ្រូទាយដែរ។ តែអ្វី ដែលពួកអ្នកនឹកឃើញនោះគឺតិចតួចបំផុត។
arabic: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِنٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: walā biqawli kāhinin qalīlan mā tadhakkarūna
